question: US bank failure by June 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any US bank fails between April 28, 2024, 12:00 PM ET, and June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET (according to FDIC's "Failed Bank List"). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

For this market to resolve to "Yes", the bank's closing date as listed by the FDIC must be within the listed date range. If there is a potential bank failure within this market's date range and FDIC "Failed Bank List" has not been updated yet, this market may remain open to allow for the list to be updated.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), specifically the "Failed Bank List" available here: https://www.fdic.gov/resources/resolutions/bank-failures/failed-bank-list/ however other official statements from the FDIC and government entities will suffice.

events.title: US bank failure by June 30?

question: Real Madrid vs. Bayern Munich: Who will advance?
description:
Real Madrid and Bayern Munich are scheduled to play in the UEFA Champions League semi-finals on April 30 and May 8, 2024.

This market will resolve to "Real Madrid" if Real Madrid advances to the finals of the UEFA Champions League by winning their tie against Bayern Munich.

This market will resolve to "Bayern" if Bayern Munich advances to the finals of the UEFA Champions League by winning their tie against Real Madrid.

If the tie between Real Madrid and Bayern Munich is postponed to a date before July 31, 2024, this market's timeframe will extend to the new match dates. If the tie is canceled, or postponed to a date in August or later, this market will resolve immediately to "50-50".

This market may be resolved immediately upon the completion of the second leg of the tie.

events.title: Real Madrid vs. Bayern Munich: Who will advance?

question: NBA: Miami Heat vs. Boston Celtics 2024-04-29
description:
This market refers to Game 4 of the NBA Playoff series between the Miami Heat and the Boston Celtics. 

If the Miami Heat win, the market will resolve to “Heat”.

If the Boston Celtics win, the market will resolve to “Celtics”.

If the game is not completed by May 6, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NBA

description:

question: North Macedonia Presidential Election Winner
description:
The second round of the North Macedonia election is scheduled for May 8, 2024.

This market will resolve to "Siljanovska" if Gordana Siljanovska-Davkova wins. This market will resolve to "Pendarovski" if Stevo Pendarovski wins.

If the result of this election isn't known by December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

If neither named candidate wins this election, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the North Macedonian government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also suffice.

events.title: North Macedonia Presidential Election Winner

question: Rishi Sunak out by May 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Rishi Sunak ceases to be Prime Minister of the United Kingdom for any length of time between April 29, 2024, and May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Sunak ceases to be Prime Minister of the United Kingdom for any length of time within this market's timeframe, this market will immediately resolve to "Yes". This market will not resolve to "No" until its timeframe expires and Sunak has remained Prime Minister of the United Kingdom for the entire duration without interruption.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of the the United Kingdom, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Rishi Sunak out by May 31?

question: Kanye drops Vultures 2 by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kanye West officially releases Volume 2 of his collab album with Ty Dolla $ign, titled ‘Vultures’, by May 3, 2024, 11:59 PM PT. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

Officially released means that Volume 2 of the album is officially available for download or streaming (not including live events) by the resolution date.

If a new album from Kanye West and Ty Dolla $ign is released between April 29 and May 3, even if not titled 'Vultures' Vol. 2 it will count for this markets resolution. 

The resolution source will be any official Kanye West/Ye streaming or download site, e.g. Apple Music or Spotify.

events.title: Kanye drops Vultures 2 by Friday?

question: ICC arrest warrants for Israeli leaders by May 15?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the International Criminal Court officially issues arrest warrants for any Israeli cabinet ministers (including Prime Minister Netanyahu) or IDF Chief of Staff Herzi Halevi, between April 28, and May 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No" .

The primary resolution source will be official information from the International Criminal Court, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: ICC arrest warrants for Israeli leaders by May 15?

question: Trump violates gag order by May 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the presiding judge in "THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK -against- DONALD J. TRUMP" explicitly states that Donald Trump has violated the gag order imposed on him by May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the gag order is lifted at any point before this market's expiration date and Donald Trump has not violated it, this market may immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the presiding court in this case, however a consensus of credible sources may also be used.

events.title: Trump violates gag order by May 31?

question: Will 'The Fall Guy' gross less than $20m opening weekend?
description:
This is a market on how much 'The Fall Guy' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt1684562/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (May 3 - 5) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'The Fall Guy' (2024) grosses less than $20,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by May 13, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

events.title: 'The Fall Guy' Opening Weekend Box Office

question: UK election in August or earlier?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the next UK general election is officially scheduled to occur between April 29, 2024, and August 31, 2024. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

UK elections are typically scheduled to occur 25 days from the date they are called. 

This market will resolve immediately upon the official announcement of the election date by the government of the United Kingdom. Any changes to the date of the next election after it is first officially scheduled will not be considered for this market’s resolution. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of the United Kingdom, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: When will UK election be held?
